data.eml:eml: Recharacterization of Rhinophis dorsimaculatus Deraniyagala, 1941 (Serpentes: Uropeltidae), including description of new material

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gower, David J., Mendis Wickramasinghe, L. J. (2016): Recharacterization of Rhinophis dorsimaculatus Deraniyagala, 1941 (Serpentes: Uropeltidae), including description of new material. Zootaxa 4158 (2): 203-212, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4158.2.3
